Sequential.TextBlock: Think about how often you do various kinds of writing. The screens that follow ask you to identify how often you have do various kinds of writing.

LikertScale.TextBlock: A text message or direct message
A list (e.g., to do list, grocery list)
Notes on a lecture or passage
